windpype main module¶

windpype.classes submodule¶

class windpype.classes.PowerData(**kwargs)¶

This class defines an object that contains the time series from a specific dataset (e.g. DK1 or Bornholm).

info(verbose=True)¶
GetPSD(power_name='TotalWindPower')¶
GetFFT(power_name='TotalWindPower', data_df=False)¶

Calculates FFT for dataframe data_df and inserts it back into data_df

GetiFFT(freq_cut=0, power_name='TotalWindPower', data_df=False)¶

Calculates inverse FFT for dataframe data_df and inserts it back into data_df

class windpype.classes.CombPowerData(**kwargs)¶

Bases: windpype.classes.PowerData

This class defines an object that contains combined info from the time series of several datasets.

GetHourlyRamps(col_name, time_period=False)¶

Calculates and returns all changes in power with one hour timesteps, as fraction of total capacity in that time period %.

GetHourlyRampPerc(time_period, percent, col_name)¶

windpype.aux submodule¶

windpype.aux.fill_missing_values(data_df, time_step=3600)¶

Data handling: Function that fills in missing time steps with the most recent value for all columns of data.

Parameters:
  • data_df (object) – Pandas dataframe containing the timeseries.
  • time_step (int/float) – Desired time step, default: 60*60 seconds
windpype.aux.CombineDataFrames(ob_1, ob_2, cut=False)¶

Data handling: Function that combines two dataframes into one.

Parameters:
  • ob_1 (object) – Object with dataframe 1 stored as attribute data_df
  • ob_2 (object) – Object with dataframe 2 stored as attribute data_df
windpype.aux.SaveData(data_df, file_path='', file_name='')¶

Data handling: Function that saves dataframe.

Parameters:
  • data_df (Pandas dataframe) – Dataframe to be stored.
  • filepath (str) – default: ‘’
  • file_name (str) – default: ‘’
windpype.aux.update_times(data_df)¶

Data handling: Function that updates date and times in dataframe.

Parameters:data_df (Pandas dataframe) – Dataframe to updated.
